answers.answer: I would try the thyroid or diabetes forum.

I have Hoshimoto. For thyroiditis avoid large quantities of soy products. This means no soy burgers and soy milk and other stuff. It is proven to mess up inflamed thyroids.Veggies like broccoli are also not good, I forget what in it thats bad.

question: what is the diet suggested for a hypothyroidism and diabetia patient
title: diet
